trans-unit.source: The JsonPropertyAttribute is used to define the mapping between property names in the client type to column names in the underlying data table.
trans-unit.target: The JsonPropertyAttribute is used to define the mapping between property names in the client type to column names in the underlying data table.

trans-unit.source: In a universal Windows app project, the TodoItem class is defined in the seperate code file in the shared DataModel folder.
trans-unit.target: In a universal Windows app project, the TodoItem class is defined in the seperate code file in the shared DataModel folder.

trans-unit.source: This code creates a mobile services-aware binding collection (items) and a proxy class for the database table (todoTable).
trans-unit.target: This code creates a mobile services-aware binding collection (items) and a proxy class for the database table (todoTable).

trans-unit.source: This sets the binding to the collection of items in todoTable, which contains all of the TodoItem objects returned from the mobile service.
trans-unit.target: This sets the binding to the collection of items in todoTable, which contains all of the TodoItem objects returned from the mobile service.

trans-unit.source: If there is a problem executing the query, a message box is raised to display the errors.

trans-unit.source: This sends an item update to the mobile service.

trans-unit.source: Now that the app has been updated to use Mobile Services for backend storage, it's time to test the app against Mobile Services.
